description:
Boxer briefs so comfortable, you won't want to take them off. Luxuriously soft Tencel Modal feels fantastic next to skin, and a hint of spandex lets the brief move with you. Using MyPakage technology, the 3-D pouch cradles you from every angle, and a pucker panel eliminates seams in sensitive areas to prevent chafing or discomfort.

  • Super-soft Tencel Modal and spandex fabric is breathable and smooth for all-day comfort
  • MyPakage technology 3-dimensional pouch provides excellent support
  • Pucker panel ensures your sensitive areas stay comfortable
  • Premium waistband is sewn directly to the body for long-lasting durability
  • Includes 2 pairs of boxer briefs
name: BN3TH Classic Boxer Briefs (2 Pack) - Men's
